content: Constand spoke for just a few seconds in a clear unemotional voice.

content: "I have testified, I have given you my victim impact statement. You heard me, the jury heard me and Mr. Cosby heard me. All I'm asking for is justice as the court sees fit," she said.

content: Gianna Constand, Constand's mother, said she has "lost the ability to trust anybody" and watched friends and loved ones disappear from her life.

tag: html body div div div article div div div div article div p span
content: "Our lives became one of a roller coaster ride that never came to an end," she said

tag: html body div div div article div div div div article div p span
content: "The thought of what happened to my daughter Andrea will always be with me forever like a dark cloud hanging over my head," he said.

tag: html body div div div article div div div div article div p span

tag: html body div div div article div div div div article div p span

content: At issue was a "nasty" personal conflict involving a prior district attorney, Bruce Castor, Cosby's team argued. O'Neil last week denied the motion, calling it untimely and "wholly without merit," court records show.
